Nasar (Grik: Νάσαρ), nke e mere baptizim na mbụ bụ Basil (Grik)),  bụ onye ndú ndị agha Byzantium a ma ama na esemokwu ndị Byzantiw Arabian nke ọkara ikpeazụ nke narị afọ nke itoolu.
A maghị ọtụtụ ihe banyere ezinụlọ Nasar
Nna ya Christopher nwere ọkwa kachasị elu nke magistros, o nwekwara nwanne nwoke aha ya bụ Barsanes
Na ihi aha ya, ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme Michele Amari kwuru na ọ bụ onye Siria, ikekwe Mardaite, sitere
N'okpuru Eze Ukwu Michael nke Atọ (r
842X867), a họpụtara ya dị ka strategos nke isiokwu Bucellarian, otu na ime ndị kasị ukwuu na ndị kachasị mkpa n'ime isiokwu nke Alaeze Ukwu Byzantium
N'ọnọdụ a, ya na onye isi ala Petronas, sonyere n'Agha nke Lalakaon na 863, ebe ndị Byzantium meriri Umar al-Aqta, eze Melitene
Mgbe ha laghachiri Constantinople, ndị ọchịagha abụọ ahụ mere emume mmeri na Hippodrome

Na afọ 879 ma ọ bụ 880, Nasar nọchiri Niketas Oryphas dị ka droungarios tou ploimou, onye isi nke ụgbọ mmiri Byzantium nke Constantinople, Emperor Basil I zigara ya megide ụgbọ mmiri Aghlabid nke na-awakpo agwaetiti Ionian
Nnupụisi nke ndị na-akwọ ụgbọ mmiri ahụ manyere ya ịkwụsị nwa oge na Methoni, mana e weghachiri ọzụzụ ma jiri ndị agha nke isiokwu mpaghara mee ka ndị ọrụ ahụ sikwuo ike
Nasar gara n'ihu merie nnukwu mmeri n'agha abalị megide ndị Aghlabids site n'enyemaka nke ọkụ ndị Gris
Nasar wee gaa n'ihu na-awakpo Sicily, na-ejide ọtụtụ ụgbọ mmiri ndị Arab ma na-eburu ọtụtụ ihe nkwata na ngwaahịa
Akụkọ na-ekwu na ọnụahịa mmanụ oliv n'ahịa Constantinople dara n'ụzọ dị egwu n'ihi ya

Ọ gara n'ihu na-akwado ọrụ ala nke ndị ọchịagha Byzantium Prokopios na Leo Apostyppes na ndịda Ịtali, tupu ha emeri ụgbọ mmiri ọzọ nke Aghlabid n'ụsọ oké osimiri Calabria; n'otu oge ahụ, ndị agha Byzantiw ọzọ nwere mmeri dị ịrịba ama na Naples

Mmeri ndị a dị oké mkpa iji weghachite ikike Byzantium n'ebe ndịda Ịtali (nke ga-abụ Catepanate nke Ịtali n'ọdịnihu), na-akwụ ụgwọ ruo na ókè maka mfu dị irè nke Sicily mgbe ọdịda nke Syracuse na 878.
